A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awesome acting but that's it. The writing is so bad it's sorrowing. Why kill Snoke? Why so many \"gotcha\" moments. I feel like they took the Force Awakens criticisms of it being a \"rehash\" to seriously and tried to dupe the audience way too many times. Basically they writers disregarded every major expectation to the point of being absolutely annoying. I was going to 3/5 but I have to one star this. Such incompetence by the writers.
